mapper.select: select c.title cellTitle,b.avator supplierAvatar,b.brand_name supplierName, o.plan_type_desc, o.plan_title planTitle,o.plan_feature feature, o.tag, o.plan_price price from cell_plan_order o inner join cell c on c.id=o.cell_id inner join brand b on c.brand_id=b.id where 1=1 and o.id=#{id}
